tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE machine_learning_models (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(255),
  model_type VARCHAR(50),
  version FLOAT,
  file_path TEXT,
  metadata JSON
);

CREATE TABLE machine_learning_models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model_description TEXT,
    model_file BLOB NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE model_deployments (
    deployment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    deployment_date TIMESTAMP,
    deployment_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'pending',
    CONSTRAINT fk_model_id FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES machine_learning_models(model_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_device_id FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES edge_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ModelTrainingLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    time_stamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    training_loss DOUBLE NOT NULL,
    validation_loss DOUBLE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE models (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    framework VARCHAR(100),
    version VARCHAR(50),
    input_shape VARCHAR(255),
    output_shape VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE model_predictions (
    prediction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    prediction_time TIMESTAMP,
    prediction_result JSON,
    model_id UUID REFERENCES models(model_id),
    device_id UUID REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);
